title: Aqours Live Starts!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>It’s finally the day of our live~! I’m not feeling sleepy at all~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru’s eyes are also wide open zura. Even though we need to hurry up and sleep~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby counted over 100 sheep....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Once you get to that point, your eyes are open even wider so that you won’t count the wrong number....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Do you guys want to stay up until the morning? I have this manga I’ve been reading~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeeh! Isn’t that the one we promised to read together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, the three of us were supposed to read it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>O-, oh, that’s right. Sorry~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... We shouldn’t do something as trivial as finishing an entire manga to pass the night... Instead, let’s do the secret art of me and my little demons.... A ritual of summoning the demon dragon from the darkness!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! That sounds like a strong monster! What’s the ritual like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You do well to have taken an interest in the ritual, Mari. Kukuku.... Even with me, you can only do this once in every a hundred years. You need the breath of a fire dragon, the beard of a gnome, the tears of a unicorn, and the wings of a fairy. With all of these, you burn an old tree and with its ash....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you.... Yoshiko-chan.... Maru can finally.... sleep zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh!? Hold on! This is only the start of the ritual~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
